title: Default Window Dimensions for Floating Tabs and Panels when Undocked
author: another-git-hub-user
body_snippet:
I wish I could fix this issue myself and contribute to mRemoteNG, because it has been driving me batty for a long time; but unfortunately I am not able to do so.

For the love of all that is good, and to save the tattered remnants of my shredded sanity; could someone... anyone... PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE fix the default dimensions/size of the floating tab and panel windows when they are first undocked and have a connected session, so that all open windows within the remote desktops do not shrink t...

iterations.description: Floating tabs/panels undock at a tiny default size, causing RDP sessions to shrink and frustrating users repeatedly

notes:
AI triage (claude): Floating tabs/panels undock at a tiny default size, causing RDP sessions to shrink and frustrating users repeatedly
Approach: When a ConnectionWindow transitions to DockState.Float, set the FloatWindow size to a reasonable default (e.g., 75% of the primary screen or match the previous docked size) instead of the DockPanelSuite small default
